summary: A remodelling of one of the most useful Followers in Skyrim, Borgakh the Steel Heart. Enhanced looks and modified perks & stats, keeping what makes her unique and unconventional.
descriptionHtml:
[b]- Orc Warrior 1H Block Sneak Archery
- made Essential
- Crime: Violence vs. enemies
- can be married
- Auto-level up[/b] (normally...)

[url=http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Borgakh_the_Steel_Heart]TES WIKI Page[/url] about the vanilla NPC, so you can compare and have further background infos.

Borgakh is a very useful follower, easy to get and the perfect bride for an Orc player... or if you\'re into green women with fangs.
Anyway. I wanted to make her prettier and less scary without losing her toughness. She\'s still that badass warrior but without the dirt, the pigface, the oversized chin & all. Just sexier.

I also [b]added relevant perks & boosted a bit her speed & energy[/b], but unlike other mods I remained close to the original character, i.e. a cunning warrior that can shoot, slash, block and sneak even with a heavy gear, and who never complains or retreat.

Now she can [b][color=red]Bash[/color][/b] properly, make a [b][color=red]Powershot[/color][/b] with her bow, and is way better with a sword ([b][color=red]Bladesman 2[/color][/b])... and other skills like [color=red]basic sneaking perks[/color] (lvl.1) or [b][color=red]Savage Strike[/color][/b] - very orcish indeed. These mods were not only made to strenghten Borgakh, but mainly to reinforce her specific traits and fighting style.

That being said, a great thanks to BETHESDA (of course) and to the creators of these mods:

[b]RECOMMENDED[/b] - for the looks only. Not needed if you just want slightly improved perks & stats.

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168]Apachii SkyHair[/url] - who doesn\'t have it already? Come on!

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2812]Better Females[/url] by Bella, another classic.

Borgakh will not look exactly like the pictures i took without these mods. I didn\'t include their orcish female face textures/meshes but if you insist I will ask 4 their permission.

[b]OPTIONAL[/b]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13722]The Eyes of Beauty[/url] by LogRaam

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709]Dimonized UNP Body[/url] by Dimon99

I did that mod while using that body mod as a player, but any other body should work fine. Let me know in comments.

[b]INSTALL:[/b]

- Download manually (I know, I don\'t use NMM)
- Unzip with Winrar
- Copy into your Skyrim/Data folder

[b]UNINSTALL:[/b]

Just remove the files!

GREY FACE BUG TIP: as with any other Follower mod, there can be a \"grey face\" bug due to the CK. It shouldn\'t occur now, but if It does, open the .esp with the CK, select Borgakh on the Actors tab and press Ctrl+F4. it will (re)create the needed meshes & textures.
Normally you won\'t have to, because I already included those files, but with the buggy CK, who knows? ^^

FEEDBACK is always appreciated on the Comments section, as well as thoughful suggestions (ex: change warpaints? mix?) but no Trolling please.
